title: [GAMEPLAY] [AUDIO] SKT Ryze No Cheering During Recall
body:
Ryze with his SKT Skin no longer has the audio of the crowd cheering during his recall.

100% reproduction rate

replies.body:
Hey Sad Loser (awh!)
Thanks for reporting this! Looks like this - like a few other issues this patch - were due to some back end file shuffling. ;-; I'll see if we can prioritize this for 8.8, since 8. 7 is just about to go live.
